page.title: 11Recreation in Whittlebury
page.content: A large percentage of the working population is in full time employment. Many commute to work as few jobs are available locally. Most popular hobbies are gardening, reading, sewing and DIY. A small survey revealed the diverse interests. Distances from ready-made entertainment and sports centres mean many pursue hobbies at home, such as music, knitting and computer programming. Group activities encourage singing, lace making and cycling. Spectator sports and swimming interest many. Unusual interests are sheepdog breeding and trials, clock repairing and parachuting. One lady races formula 3 cars.
